item.title: About Me
item.description: Welcome! I’m the founder of Puzzlet, a git-based GenAI platform! I’m a developer, founder, and developer ralations advocate. I’m passionate about Software Architecture, Content Management Systems, and LLM Ops. Previously, I’ve worked at Hubspot and Curriculum Associates in both IC and tech lead roles. Outside of Puzzlet, I create blog content, and provide consulting for companies building content management systems.

item.title: Projects
item.description: 2024 puzzlet.ai - A Git-Based Collaborative GenAI Platform grademyprompt.com - Grade your prompts, and get feedback on how to improve them llmcalc.com - LLM cost calculator/comparison tool 2023 forage.domains - Find the perfect domain name using AI Older canvas-latex - An open source library for rendering LaTeX in HTML5’s canvas

item.title: Technical Talks
item.description: Upcoming Nov 12, 2024: Using Generative AI in Production - Portland, Maine
